acceptance-test-run.title: Display a message if the search string does not match any case
acceptance-test-run.name: Display a message if the search string does not match any case

tag.name: Manage list of cases/Search for cases
Search for cases/Search for cases by customer

test-step.description: Given There are 5 cases, one from customer MyStuff, one from customer MySofa and 3 from customer Stuff24
When I show the list of open cases
And I enter "abc" into the search input field
Then I see a message "no case found for 'abc'"
